trans-unit.source: $ conda install -c conda-forge fluids
trans-unit.target: $ conda install -c conda-forge流体

trans-unit.source: $ git clone git://github.com/CalebBell/fluids.git
trans-unit.target: $ git clone git：//github.com/CalebBell/fluids.git

trans-unit.source: $ pip install fluids
trans-unit.target: $点安装液体

trans-unit.source: Although not required by the fluids license, if it is convenient for you, please cite fluids if used in your work. Please also consider contributing any changes you make back, such that they may be incorporated into the main library and all of us will benefit from them.
trans-unit.target: 虽然 fluids 许可证没有要求,但如果您方便的话,请在您的工作中使用 fluids。也请考虑将您所做的任何修改反馈给我们,这样它们可能会被纳入主库,我们所有人都会从中受益。

trans-unit.source: Fluid dynamics component of Chemical Engineering Design Library (ChEDL)
trans-unit.target: 化学工程设计库(ChEDL)中的流体动力学部分。

trans-unit.source: Fluids is MIT licensed. See
trans-unit.target: Fluids是MIT授权的。请看

trans-unit.source: Fluids is open-source software for engineers and technicians working in the fields of chemical, mechanical, or civil engineering. It includes modules for piping, fittings, pumps, tanks, compressible flow, open-channel flow, atmospheric properties, solar properties, particle size distributions, two phase flow, friction factors, control valves, orifice plates and other flow meters, ejectors, relief valves, and more.
trans-unit.target: Fluids是一款开源软件,适用于在化学、机械或土木工程领域工作的工程师和技术人员。它包括管道、管件、泵、罐、可压缩流、开道流、大气特性、太阳特性、粒度分布、两相流、摩擦系数、控制阀、孔板和其他流量计、喷射器、溢流阀等模块。

trans-unit.source: Fluids runs on all operating systems which support Python, is quick to install, and is free of charge. Fluids is designed to be easy to use while still providing powerful functionality. If you need to perform some fluid dynamics calculations, give fluids a try.
trans-unit.target: Fluids可以运行在所有支持Python的操作系统上,安装速度快,而且是免费的。Fluids 被设计成易于使用,同时提供强大的功能。如果你需要进行一些流体动力学计算,不妨试试Fluids。

trans-unit.source: Fluids was originally tightly integrated with SciPy and NumPy; today they are optional components used for only a small amount of functionality which do not have pure-Python numerical methods implemented. Fluids targets Python 2.7 and up as well as PyPy2 and PyPy3. Additionally, fluids has been tested by the author to load in IronPython, Jython, and micropython.
trans-unit.target: Fluids最初与SciPy和NumPy紧密集成,如今它们是可选的组件,只用于少量没有实现纯Python数值方法的功能。Fluids的目标是Python 2.7及以上版本,以及PyPy2和PyPy3。此外,fluids已经被作者测试过,可以在IronPython、Jython和micropython中加载。

trans-unit.source: Get the latest version of fluids from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/fluids/
trans-unit.target: 从https://pypi.python.org/pypi/fluids/获取最新版本的流体

trans-unit.source: If you have an installation of Python with pip, simple install it with:
trans-unit.target: 如果你已经安装了Pip的Python,可以简单地用以下方法安装它。

trans-unit.source: If you have further questions about the usage of the library, feel free to contact the author at Caleb.Andrew.Bell@gmail.com.
trans-unit.target: 如果您对库的使用有其他疑问，请随时通过Caleb.Andrew.Bell@gmail.com与作者联系。

trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.target: 最新的源代码

trans-unit.source: License information
trans-unit.target: 许可证信息

trans-unit.source: The fluids library is designed to be a low-overhead, lightweight repository of engineering knowledge and utilities that relate to fluid dynamics. It occupies ~4 MB of RAM on load and should load in a small fraction of a second.
trans-unit.target: fluids库被设计成一个低开销、轻量级的工程知识库和与流体动力学有关的实用程序。它在加载时占用约4 MB的RAM,并且应该在一秒钟内加载一小部分。

trans-unit.source: The latest development version of fluids’s sources can be obtained at

trans-unit.target: 要获得git版本,运行。

trans-unit.source: What is Fluids?
trans-unit.target: 什么是流体?

trans-unit.source: While the routines in Fluids are normally quite fast and as efficiently coded as possible, depending on the application there can still be a need for further speed. PyPy provides a substantial speed boost of 6-12 times for most methods. It is the author’s preferred accelerator. Fluids also supports Numba, a powerful accelerator that works well with NumPy.
trans-unit.target: 尽管Fluids中的例程通常非常快且编码效率尽可能高，但根据应用程序的不同，仍然可能需要进一步提高速度。对于大多数方法，PyPy可以将速度提高6-12倍。它是作者首选的加速器。Fluids还支持Numba，Numba是一种功能强大的加速器，可与NumPy很好地配合使用。

trans-unit.source: fluids’s documentation is available on the web:
